title: Fake Recruiters Distribute Banking Trojan
summary: A phishing scam uses fake recruiters to distribute a banking trojan via malicious apps. This threat is significant for users who may be lured by job offers, leading to device compromise.

recommendations.name: Use Official App Stores
recommendations.rationale: Downloading apps only from official stores reduces the risk of installing malicious software.

specific_offerings.name: Google Play Store
specific_offerings.summary: Official app store for Android devices, providing verified apps.

specific_offerings.name: Apple App Store
specific_offerings.summary: Official app store for iOS devices, ensuring app safety and security.

recommendations.name: Enable App Permissions Review
recommendations.rationale: Regularly reviewing app permissions helps identify and remove unnecessary access.

specific_offerings.name: Android Settings
specific_offerings.summary: Manage app permissions through Android settings to control access.

specific_offerings.name: iOS Settings
specific_offerings.summary: Use iOS settings to review and adjust app permissions for better security.

title: Credential Stuffing Attacks
summary: Credential stuffing attacks exploit reused passwords across multiple accounts. Users with weak password practices are at high risk.

recommendations.name: Use Password Manager
recommendations.rationale: A password manager helps create and store strong, unique passwords for each account.

specific_offerings.name: LastPass
specific_offerings.summary: Password manager that securely stores and generates passwords.

specific_offerings.name: 1Password
specific_offerings.summary: Tool for managing and generating strong passwords across devices.

recommendations.name: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
recommendations.rationale: Adding an extra layer of security makes unauthorized access more difficult.

specific_offerings.name: Google Authenticator
specific_offerings.summary: App providing two-factor authentication codes for enhanced security.

specific_offerings.name: Authy
specific_offerings.summary: Two-factor authentication app that secures accounts with additional verification.

title: Google Workspace Security
summary: Google Workspace offers robust tools for productivity but requires user diligence to secure data. Users must manage access and backups.

recommendations.name: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
recommendations.rationale: Enhances account security by requiring additional verification.

specific_offerings.name: Google Workspace
specific_offerings.summary: Provides built-in options for enabling multi-factor authentication.

specific_offerings.name: Duo Security
specific_offerings.summary: Offers multi-factor authentication solutions compatible with Google Workspace.

recommendations.name: Regular Data Backups
recommendations.rationale: Ensures data is recoverable in case of accidental deletion or cyber threats.

specific_offerings.name: Google Drive
specific_offerings.summary: Cloud storage service for backing up and accessing files securely.

specific_offerings.name: Backupify
specific_offerings.summary: Provides automated backup solutions for Google Workspace data.
